column107:
Sec. 21-5.250 Farm dwellings.
(a) In the AG-1 district, the number of farm dwellings shall not exceed one for each five acres of lot area. In
the AG-2 district, the number of farm dwellings shall not exceed one for each two acres of lot area.
(b) Each farm dwelling and any accessory uses shall be contained within an area not to exceed 5,000 square
feet of the lot

Sec. 21-5.250 Farm dwellings.
(a) In the AG-1 district, the number of farm dwellings shall not exceed one for each five acres of lot area. In
the AG-2 district, the number of farm dwellings shall not exceed one for each two acres of lot area.
(b) Each farm dwelling and any accessory uses shall be contained within an area not to exceed 5,000 square
feet of the lot

column21: None, "Building area" includes "all-weather surfaces", which are basically roads or concrete pads for building on, but do not include all impervious surfaces
column22:
Excluding carport or garage areas: 
2 per unit up to 3,249 square feet
3 per unit from 3,250 to 3,999 square feet
4 per unit from 4,000 to 4,749 square feet
1 additional for each 750 square feet over 4,000 square feet
column24:
Baseline: 15 ft    

If w/ height setbacks:  25 ft, set back from every side
and rear buildable area boundary line one foot for each two feet of additional height above 15 feet 

Except if lot has a slope of 15 degrees or greater, in which case the maximum height varies from 20 feet at the edge of the buildable area along to up to 30 feet along a line measured 60 degrees from the horizontal top of the 20 foot heigh.

- 1 hotel/motel room = .5 dwelling unit(s)
- 1 parking space per 3 hotel rooms
- hotel w >3 rooms needs Class IV Zoning Permit to convert into dwelling unit

- 1 hotel/motel room = .5 dwelling unit(s)
- 1 parking space per 3 hotel rooms
- hotel w >3 rooms needs Class IV Zoning Permit to convert into dwelling unit

1 Additional dwelling unit per additional 3 acres on same parcel; max 5 on one parcel

A parcel or contiguous parcels in common ownership of record existing prior to or on September 1, 1972, which is smaller than one (1) acre, may develop one (1) dwelling unit

Higher density PRD permitted if AH

column16: The minimum distance of any building from the right-of-way line of a public or private street or the pavement line of a driveway or parking lot used by the public shall be five (5) feet unless the building is entered from that side by motor vehicles in which case the minimum distance shall be fifteen (15) feet.
column106:
1 dormitory = 1/2 of one dwelling unit

Permits:
- Class I Permit if Use Permit or a Variance Permit not required; development prohibited in Constraint District or Special Treatment District
- Class IV Permit for >100 dormitory units, or if Class I permit requires Use Permit or Variance Permit
- Applicant shall show compliance, and submit plot plan where necessary

Waste Lines:
- Must be screened by fence, wall, hedge, or plant screen from public thoroughfares when serving >2 dwelling units
- If <10 dwelling units/acre on parcel, all lines (electric, distribution, telephone, gas, cable, etc.) must be installed underground unless scenic and environmental values better protected otherwise

Underground Line Exemptions:
- Lines used exclusively for fire/police alarm boxes, lighting, or traffic control;
- Overhead wires attached to exterior of one building
- Belonging to underground facilities if they harmonize with area

column5: CID Napili Bay Civic Improvement District
column107: The permitted uses shall be as provided for in the hotel district and as listed in chapter 19.14 of this code, for any hotel or apartment-hotel use established by August 6, 2021, provided, that any permitted accessory use shall be an integral function of the hotel operation, and shall be operated by the management provided only for the convenience of the guests and shall not be an independent commercial venture. The permitted uses shall be as provided for in the residential and apartment districts as listed in chapters 19.08 and 19.12 of this title for any use established after August 6, 2021.
